name: Infectors
description:
Infectors is a sokoban-like game where you have to solve puzzles pushing cryogenic capsules toward viruses to capture them and save the earth from the invasion. At the moment the game count with 21 levels.

This version is a Phaser port from the original version developed in Pygame in December 2007. Background music and sound effects were created by my friend David Senabre.

This game is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License

It works in Chrome and Firefox (and probably in other browsers but I haven't tested)

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Escape for menu, R to restart, Q to quit, M to mute
